(Photo by Kris Connor/Getty Images) Photo: Kris Connor, Getty Images Image 42 of 42 Eva Longoria directs in sexy bathing suit on set of new show 'Hot & Bothered' 1 / 42 Back to Gallery On the heels of spending big bucks for a big casa recently comes Eva Longoria in an itty-bitty swimsuit as she directs a scene on the set of her new TV show, "Hot & Bothered."
The 40-year-old actress snapped an Instagram photo of herself Wednesday in a plunging purple one-piece suit while at work on her sitcom.
"Yep ... this is me ... directing! #DoesntEveryOneWearThis," she posted about her directing duds for the NBC soap opera comedy she stars in and also is an executive producer.
In the snap she is smokin' hot and definitely not bothered by the suit that is tightly cinched around her waist with a bejeweled gold belt.
RELATED: Eva Longoria buys Tom Cruise's $11.4 million mansion in Hollywood Hills
Earlier this week Variety.com reported that Longoria purchased Tom Cruise's Hollywood Hills compound for $11.4 million. Among her other duties are designing a Home Collection of bedding linens, pillows, comforters and curtains for JCPenney. And next year she will launch a womenswear line based on her favorite looks from her own closet or as she told us in a recent visit to San Antonio, garments that will do double duty by taking a woman from day to night.
